name: schemio
description: in browser app for creating interactive diagrams

scripts.build: babel src/server -d dist/server ; babel src/common -d dist/common
scripts.start: nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-app-dev; npm run build-standalone; npm run build-ui-static-app-dev; npm run build && node dist/server/server.js'
scripts.light-start: nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-app-dev; npm run build && node dist/server/server.js'
scripts.start-drive: nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-app-drive-dev; npm run build && node dist/server/server-drive.js'
scripts.start-static: nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-ui-static-app-dev; npm run build && node dist/server/server-static.js'
scripts.start-playground: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/  -e 'js, html, vue' --exec 'npm run build-standalone && npm run build-playground && node dist/server/server-playground.js'
scripts.build-app-prod: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.build.app.prod.js; cp dist/assets/schemio.app.js assets/; npm run build-standalone-prod
scripts.build-component-prod: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.build.prod.js; npm run build-standalone-prod
scripts.build-standalone-prod: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.standalone.prod.js; cp dist/assets/schemio-standalone.js assets/.
scripts.build-ui-static-app-dev: webpack --config webpack.build.app.static.dev.js; cp dist/assets/schemio.app.static.js assets/.; cp html/index-static.html assets/index-static.html
scripts.build-ui-static-app-prod: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.build.app.static.prod.js; cp dist/assets/schemio.app.static.js assets/.; cp html/index-static.html assets/index-static.html
scripts.build-app-drive-dev: webpack --config webpack.build.app.drive.dev.js; cp dist/assets/schemio.app.drive.js assets/; npm run build-standalone
scripts.build-app-drive-prod: webpack --config webpack.build.app.drive.prod.js; cp dist/assets/schemio.app.drive.js assets/; npm run build-standalone-prod

author: Ivan Shubin
